summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GovEnforce council enforcement app. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend login and dashboard working, public report submission successful. Found role-based access control issues and session persistence problems.

ui_bugs.issue: Role-based access control not working correctly - officer role shows Reports menu (should be supervisor/manager only)
User name not updating correctly when switching between different role logins - shows 'Jane Smith' for all roles
Session appears to expire quickly, redirecting users back to login page during navigation

integration_issues.issue: ShadCN Select components not working properly with data-testid selectors in automated testing

passed_tests: Backend API login for all roles (manager, supervisor, officer)
Frontend login page loading and demo credentials display
Frontend manager login and dashboard access
Frontend public report form and submission
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix role-based access control in frontend - ensure Reports menu is hidden for officers, fix user name display when switching between roles, and investigate session persistence issues causing premature logouts
